parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the torque converter can cause transmission problems, leading to difficulty shifting gears, loss of power, and potential accidents.
The failure of the axle seal can cause reduced braking power, leading to increased stopping distances and potential accidents, especially in cold weather.
The failure of the transmission cooler line can cause transmission damage, leading to costly repairs and potential accidents.
The failure of the upper ball joint can cause the front wheel to fall off, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: the vehicle pulls to one side
unusual noises or vibrations from the front suspension
